ComicInfo.Summary:
In the final, climactic installment of Barbarella and Dejah Thoris’ adventure together, they must rearrange events of the past in order to figure out their respective ways home! Meddling in an ancient war has consequences, though, and Dejah Thoris must decide if she is willing to pay the price despite knowing how it will impact Mars for thousands of years to come.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Laura Braga | 1 | B | Cover B | Zach Hsieh, Jimmy Reyes & Triona Farrell | 2 | C | Cover C | Anthony Marques & Valentina Pinto | 3 | D | Cover D | German Garcia | 4 | E | Cosplay Cover E | Photo | 5 | F/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover (Seduction) | Maria Sanapo & Ceci de la Cruz | 6 | G/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | German Garcia | 7 | H/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Laura Braga | 8 | I/RI | 1:40 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Zach Hsieh & Jimmy Reyes | 9 | J/RI | 1:50 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Maria Sanapo | 10 | K/RI | Virgin Photo Edition Cosplay Variant Cover | Photo | 11 |
